text: Aloe descoingsii is a species of Aloe native to Madagascar. Regarded as the smallest Aloe species in the world, it generally reaches a maximum of about 3 inches (7.62cm) across. With white spotted leaves, A. descoingsii grows via offsets in clumps and sports tiny orange flowers. == References == ==External links== descoingsii Category:Flora of Madagascar
title: Aloe descoingsii
